original_text: And I said unto the nobles, and to the rulers, and to the rest of the people, The work is great and large, and we are separated upon the wall, one far from another.
korean_text: 내가 귀족들과 민장들과 남은 백성에게 이르기를 이 공사는 크고 넓으므로 우리가 성에서 떨어져 거리가 먼즉

sentences.original_text: And I said unto the nobles
and to the rest of the people
The work is great and large
and we are separated upon the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리는 성벽 위에 분리되어 있으니
